alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Lonoke; Prairie; Pulaski; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 11:37PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Prairie, northern Lonoke, southeastern Faulkner, southwestern White and northeastern Pulaski Counties through 1215 AM CST... At 1137 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Enola to near West Little Rock. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Little Rock... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Cabot... Searcy... Maumelle... Little Rock AFB... North Little Rock Airport... Beebe... Ward... Vilonia... Bald Knob... Mayflower... Austin in Lonoke County... Judsonia... Kensett... Higginson... Enola... Mount Vernon... Old Austin... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
